about.title: Developed Where It's Used
about.description: MediSkill was founded by Martin Lawaetz, specialist in vascular surgery. Inspired by gaps during his own training, it started as a local project and is now a fully functional digital tool. It has been developed and tested in the real everyday environment where doctors work. It has been important not to be just another documentation burden, but to be a tool that actually helps, makes documentation easier, and results in something that can be used concretely in daily practice.

platform.title: Platform Functionality

procedure_logging.title: Intuitive Procedure Logging
procedure_logging.description: Trainees log procedures easily directly in the app. The system supports all medical and surgical specialties, adapted to learning objectives and local processes.
procedure_logging.highlight: Reduced administrative burden, systematic and standardized data collection, and increased focus on learning.

feedback_system.title: Systematic and Structured Feedback
feedback_system.description: Supervisors can provide structured feedback with objective assessments based on established assessment tools such as OSATS, NOTSS, Mini-CEX as well as specialty and procedure-specific assessment tools. The system also supports audio feedback with live transcription.
feedback_system.highlight: Up to 100+ objective assessments per active trainee - an unprecedented insight into competency development, enabling focused development in areas that provide the most learning.

platform.integration_video_title: See how MediSkill easily integrates into a busy workday

procedure_overview.title: Detailed Procedure Overview
procedure_overview.description: Systematic registration and visualization of all procedures divided by type and level of independence. Color-coded progression from assistant to independent execution gives both trainees and supervisors a precise overview of where to focus in further training.
procedure_overview.highlight: Evidence-based approach to competency development with documentation of actual experience rather than theoretical knowledge.

realtime_overview.title: Real-time Progression Overview
realtime_overview.description: Visual and user-friendly presentation of trainees' progression with trends over time. Training coordinators and supervisors can follow development and identify areas needing focused training.

competency_profiles.title: Competency Profiles
competency_profiles.description: Detailed overview of progression and skills creates competency profiles based on trainees' actual daily work. This also creates national standards and supports health authority recommendations for competency profiles.
competency_profiles.highlight: Tailored training programs based on individual competency profiles.

integrated_mentoring.title: Integrated Mentoring Sessions
integrated_mentoring.description: Supervisor meetings can take place directly in MediSkill, where all relevant information about the trainee is displayed. The structure follows health authority recommendations and is adapted to learning objectives. Supervisor forms can be completed in MediSkill and printed/saved directly.
bullets: All historical data available during the session ensures efficiency

intelligent_guidance.title: 24/7 Intelligent Guidance
intelligent_guidance.description: Both trainees and supervisors have access to an AI mentor with deep insight into individual progression. The system can answer questions about progress, suggest focus areas, and provide personal recommendations.
intelligent_guidance.highlight: "How is the trainee's progress in the last two months?" - The AI analyzes data and provides concrete answers about procedures, independence, and progression.

procedure_list.title: Print Your Procedure List
procedure_list.description: No more pocket books and Excel sheets in different formats. Standardized documentation ensures uniform CV presentation in a predefined format designed according to learning objectives and local processes. Available 24/7 and always updated.

wellness_monitoring.title: Wellness and Work Environment Monitoring
wellness_monitoring.description: The MediLife module enables monitoring of wellness and work environment on selected parameters. Good wellness and optimal competency development are inextricably linked, and continuous monitoring enables timely intervention.
